title: Kylie Jenner's 'Rise and Shine' moment smashes TikTok as it hits a billion views

Kylie Jenner has bagged herself another phenomenal record after becoming the fastest to smash the billion view mark on TikTok.

The 22-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has caused a viral sensation after singing 'rise and shine' to her daughter Stormi Webster.

It has now smashed video creation app TikTok, with it breaking through the billion view barrier in just days, the fastest video to have achieved this milestone.

The clamour for Kylie started all so quietly, as she shared a video tour of her Kylie Cosmetics premises, where the makeup mogul's products are realised.

During the tour, Kylie takes us into Stormi's room at the office, where she is seen sleeping in her bed there.

Pausing at the door, Kylie turns to the camera, and whispers: "We're gonna wake Stormi up and get out of here and show you guys her room."

(Image: Instagram)

Turning on the light in the room, Kylie stands over Stormi's bed and sings "rise and shine" in a gloriously tuneful song.

Immediately it took social media by storm and memes were created quicker that Kylie could sing those three words.

Fans of TikTok were soon recreating their own #RiseandShine moment and less than a week after the first video was produced, there had been a billion views of content with the 'rise and shine' hashtag.

It has become TikTok's fastest ever trend, with it clocking four million views on day one.

This had rocketed to 70 million by the end of the second day.

Just a couple days later it had smashed through the billion barrier and TikTok had become a glowing tribute to Kylie's moment of melody.
